properties.title: Sample of an applet with JTreeMap

section.name: The Applet Example
section.p: JTreeMap comes with an applet that you can use directly on your site. Here is an example:

ul.li: Parameter 'dataFile', the location of the data file, relative to the codebase of the applet
width and height are configured in the usual applet way

div.pre: <applet archive="./jtreemap-@JARVERSION@.jar" code="net.sf.jtreemap.swing.example.JTreeMapAppletExample.class" width="600" height="400"> <param name="dataFile" value="samples/dataDump.xml"/> <param name="dataFileType" value="xml"/> </applet>
